org.wso2.carbon.registry.core.service
Class RemoteRegistry

java.lang.Object
  org.wso2.carbon.registry.core.service.RemoteRegistry
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.wso2.carbon.repository.Registry, org.wso2.carbon.repository.TransactionManager
public class RemoteRegistry
extends Object
implements org.wso2.carbon.repository.Registry

This is a core class of the Remote Atom Based implementation of the Registry. This will be used mostly as a front-end client to access the Registry repository. This implementation is based on a REST-ful Atom Pub protocol implementation provided by Apache Abdera.

Constructor Summary
RemoteRegistry(String registryURL, String userName, String password, org.wso2.carbon.repository.RegistryService registryService)
          To create a remote registry to connect to a secure registry or a registry where we need to pass userName and the password to perform any operation.
RemoteRegistry(URL registryURL, org.wso2.carbon.repository.RegistryService registryService)
          To create a remote registry need to provide a URL of a remote registry and the URL should be something like http://localhost:8080/wso2registry/atom/r1
RemoteRegistry(URL registryURL, String userName, String password, org.wso2.carbon.repository.RegistryService registryService)
          To create a remote registry to connect to a secure registry or a registry where we need to pass userName and the password to perform any operation.

Constructor Detail

RemoteRegistry

public RemoteRegistry(URL registryURL,
                      org.wso2.carbon.repository.RegistryService registryService)
To create a remote registry need to provide a URL of a remote registry and the URL should be something like http://localhost:8080/wso2registry/atom/r1

Parameters:
registryURL - URL to the registry or to the resource

RemoteRegistry

public RemoteRegistry(URL registryURL,
                      String userName,
                      String password,
                      org.wso2.carbon.repository.RegistryService registryService)
               throws org.wso2.carbon.repository.exceptions.RepositoryException
To create a remote registry to connect to a secure registry or a registry where we need to pass userName and the password to perform any operation. Passing not null value registry will send the username and the password for each request. Need to remember here is that the username and the password send as plain text.

Parameters:
registryURL - URL to the registry or to the resource
userName - user name of the registry, value can be null, if the value is null then the user will be the anonymous.
password - password, value can be null
Throws:
org.wso2.carbon.repository.exceptions.RepositoryException - if an error occurred.

RemoteRegistry

public RemoteRegistry(String registryURL,
                      String userName,
                      String password,
                      org.wso2.carbon.repository.RegistryService registryService)
               throws MalformedURLException,
                      org.wso2.carbon.repository.exceptions.RepositoryException
To create a remote registry to connect to a secure registry or a registry where we need to pass userName and the password to perform any operation. Passing not null value registry will send the username and the password for each request. Need to remember here is that the username and the password send as plain text.

Parameters:
registryURL - URL to the registry or to the resource as a String.
userName - user name of the registry, value can be null, if the value is null then the user will be the anonymous.
password - password, value can be null
Throws:
org.wso2.carbon.repository.exceptions.RepositoryException - if an error occurred.
MalformedURLException - if the URL was not properly formed.

addPropertyExtensionElement

public static void addPropertyExtensionElement(Properties properties,
                                               org.apache.abdera.factory.Factory factory,
                                               org.apache.abdera.model.ExtensibleElement entry,
                                               QName node1name,
                                               QName node2Name)
This will generate extension element and that will add to the entry , the created element will be something like <node1name> <node2Name> + <name></name> <value></value> </node2Name> </node1name>

Parameters:
properties - List of Name value pairs
factory - Abdera Factory
entry - Instance of entry where extension element need to add
node1name - Name of node 1
node2Name - Name of node 2

restore

public void restore(String path,
                    Reader reader,
                    int timeout)
             throws org.wso2.carbon.repository.exceptions.RepositoryException
check in the input axiom element into database

Parameters:
path - path to check in
reader - reader containing resource
timeout - the time to wait.
Throws:
org.wso2.carbon.repository.exceptions.RepositoryException - if the operation failed.

dump

                 int timeout,
                 Writer writer)
          throws org.wso2.carbon.repository.exceptions.RepositoryException

Parameters:
path - path to check out
writer - writer to write the response
timeout - the time to wait.
Throws:
org.wso2.carbon.repository.exceptions.RepositoryException - if the operation failed.
